name: Paper doll Dress up game
description:
A internet trends inspired dress up game with over 30 items and multiple combinations of outfits. Simple fun and endless inspiration for all players!

Feel free to save the character if you like the designs just remember to credit my game :)

Click on an item and if you like it continue to the next category. If you want to remove the item just click take off from the tab you got it in. On extras the items are drag and drop.
